item.title: Django Shell Plus Imports
item.description: The topic of this blog is about controlling import order resolution when using the django extension, shell_plus: http://django-extensions.readthedocs.io/en/latest/shell_plus.html Shell plus is an interactive python shell that will load in your apps DB models: django python manage.py shell_plus When you do this, by default, all of your app’s models will be imported. But, there is a way you can control which models get imported, and the order in which they do. For example: If you want to preimport a model/module before the shell plus imports, you should add the following to your configuration file in your django project:
